name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess strong expertise in **AWS**, **Azure**, **Kubernetes**, and **OpenStack**. My background in **Python** and scripting with **Golang** and **Ruby** equips me with the technical aptitude necessary for modern DevOps practices. I have extensive experience in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines using **Jenkins**, **Git**, and **Artifactory**, ensuring seamless and efficient deployment processes. I am proficient in Linux and networking concepts, enabling robust infrastructure management and optimization.

In addition to my technical skills, I have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms that require compliance with industry standards, contributing to secure and reliable deployments in critical sectors like healthcare and finance. I excel in automation strategies utilizing tools such as **Ansible** and **Chef**, and have practical experience in developing microservices architecture and event-driven systems, thus enhancing operational efficiency. My strong communication skills support collaborative efforts in cross-functional teams, and my dedication to continuous learning drives my ability to adapt in fast-paced environments.
